body_html:
While figuring out several issues, I added 'add_definitions(-D__NVCC__) to tf_core_kernel , which caused that error. Finally, I built tf with cmake and got .so and .a libraries, but I need to test and validate them.
Plus, I'm also exploring how to build .whl package after cmake build.

Plus, I'm also exploring how to build .whl package after cmake build.
body:
While figuring out several issues, I added 'add_definitions(-D__NVCC__) to tf_core_kernel , which caused that error.  Finally, I built tf with cmake and got .so and .a libraries, but I need to test and validate them. 
Plus, I'm also exploring how to build .whl package after cmake build.
